thread.section_title: MicksGarage.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MicksGarage.com | www.micksgarage.com
thread.title: Charles Hawkes

author: Charles Hawkes
title: Charles Hawkes
text:
I have used Micks garage for a couple of separate purchases now but unfortunately I made a mistake on one order and after a quick call to them they took the goods back for a full refund no problems and very helpful on the phone, I have now used them again and the goods were with me the second day.
Thanks again Mickey
Great service thank you. I can highly recommend
